title: Romeo Eleven
text: Romeo Eleven () is a 2011 Canadian <a href="drama%20film">drama film</a> directed by <a href="Ivan%20Grbovic">Ivan Grbovic</a>, and written by Grbovic and <a href="Sara%20Mishara">Sara Mishara</a>. Set in Montreal's Lebanese Christian community, the film is a coming-of-age story about a physically handicapped 20-year-old man.
